code: import axios from'../config/axios';export var asyncGetCustomers=function asyncGetCustomers(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/customers',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(getCustomers(result.reverse()));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var getCustomers=function getCustomers(customers){return{type:'GET_CUSTOMERS',payload:customers};};export var asyncAddCustomer=function asyncAddCustomer(formData,formReset){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/customers',formData,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(addCustomer(result));formReset();}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var addCustomer=function addCustomer(customer){return{type:'ADD_CUSTOMER',payload:customer};};export var asyncDeleteCustomer=function asyncDeleteCustomer(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/customers/".concat(id),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;dispatch(deleteCustomer(result._id));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var deleteCustomer=function deleteCustomer(id){return{type:'DELETE_CUSTOMER',payload:id};};export var asyncEditCustomer=function asyncEditCustomer(formData,id){return function(dispatch){axios.put("/customers/".concat(id),formData,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(editCustomer(result));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var editCustomer=function editCustomer(customer){return{type:'EDIT_CUSTOMER',payload:customer};};
